match.title: 1st ODI
match.statusText: Pakistan won by 5 wickets (with 146 balls remaining)

image.caption: Fans enjoy a domestic Twenty20 match at the Shere-Bangla Stadium
image.longCaption: Fans enjoy a domestic Twenty20 match at the Shere-Bangla Stadium, Mirpur, October 15, 2009

match.hoursInfo: 13.30 start, First Session 13.30-17.00, Interval 17.00-17.45, Second Session 17.45-21.15

headshotImage.caption: Umar Gul player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Umar Gul player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Nasir Hossain c †Sarfaraz Ahmed b Aizaz Cheema 21 (40b 2x4 0x6 42m) SR: 52.5

dismissalComment.html: the end of Nasir, just when the partnership seemed to be steadying Bangladesh, a short ball that Nasir wanted to mow over midwicket, it strikes low on the bat and balloons towards short fine leg, the keeper calls early for it and settles under it, there's no Kamran Akmal moment either as Sarfraz calmly collects the skier

dismissalText.commentary: Rubel Hossain not out 15 (10b 3x4 0x6 8m) SR: 150

headshotImage.caption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: Afridi joins the party, again there's a lot of bounce for the bowler, again the batsman goes for the cut, again there's a top-edge, slices it to Shoaib Malik at backward point, and that's the fourth wicket, Nafees has had a horrid time today, looked completely out of place
this match is heading for a very early finish, plenty of spin for Afridi, length ball turning away, Mahmudullah stretches forward to defend, the outside edge results, easy for Sarfraz, five down now

how many batsmen will get out playing the cut? it was well outside off, Shakib stretches to reach that and slaps it limply to point, not the finest of strokes that, and once again that man Afridi makes an instant impact

headshotImage.caption: Farhad Reza player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Farhad Reza player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: and another one for Afridi, Reza is lbw, he was stretching forward to defend that one down the track, it spins past the inside edge and strikes the pads, that looked to be heading for legstump, the umpire thought so as well, Bangladesh are falling like nine pins, and Afridi hasn't even brought out his star-man celebration yet, perhaps if he gets a fifth

headshotImage.caption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: there's the five-for, Afridi doesn't bother celebrating, this one slides on, batsman looks to defend, inside-edges it on to his pad, the ball pops up for the keeper to come round in front of the stumps and collect that, Bangladesh rolled over for 91

Hafeez has got the big wicket, he's off on a celebratory run after getting Tamim lbw, that was slightly full from Hafeez pitching around middle, Tamim opted to play that off the back foot instead on coming forward, the ball slides on and strikes the pads, probably would have taken leg stump, height wasn't a problem there, Hafeez can't do a thing wrong these days

dismissalText.commentary: Tamim Iqbal lbw b Mohammad Hafeez 0 (4b 0x4 0x6 2m) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: Hafeez has got the big wicket, he's off on a celebratory run after getting Tamim lbw, that was slightly full from Hafeez pitching around middle, Tamim opted to play that off the back foot instead on coming forward, the ball slides on and strikes the pads, probably would have taken leg stump, height wasn't a problem there, Hafeez can't do a thing wrong these days

headshotImage.longCaption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Umar Gul player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Umar Gul player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Naeem Islam c Misbah-ul-Haq b Umar Gul 5 (13b 1x4 0x6 19m) SR: 38.46

dismissalComment.html: another one goes! After that drive, Naeem couldn't tempt poking at a full delivery outside off, just moved away a hint and took the outside edge, Misbah stood firm at slip, watching it closely and took a good, low catch

headshotImage.caption: Shoaib Malik player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shoaib Malik player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Mushfiqur Rahim c †Sarfaraz Ahmed b Shoaib Malik 11 (27b 0x4 0x6 25m) SR: 40.74

dismissalComment.html: Mushfiqur finally falls to the cut, that one from Shoaib bounces extra, it was wide outside off, Mushfiqur throws the bat at it but can only edge it to the keeper, he is extremely disappointed with that stroke, trudges off looking skywards

dismissalComment.html: Afridi joins the party, again there's a lot of bounce for the bowler, again the batsman goes for the cut, again there's a top-edge, slices it to Shoaib Malik at backward point, and that's the fourth wicket, Nafees has had a horrid time today, looked completely out of place

headshotImage.longCaption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.longCaption: Saeed Ajmal player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.long: c Younis Khan b Saeed Ajmal
dismissalText.commentary: Abdur Razzak c Younis Khan b Saeed Ajmal 3 (6b 0x4 0x6 4m) SR: 50

dismissalComment.html: this is all too easy for Pakistan, Razzak closes the face of the bat too early, gets an edge to a delivery that's pitching around off, the edge flies to left of Younis, who clasps that one easily, eight down now and the crowd's mood further worsens

headshotImage.longCaption: Farhad Reza player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Farhad Reza player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Farhad Reza player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: and another one for Afridi, Reza is lbw, he was stretching forward to defend that one down the track, it spins past the inside edge and strikes the pads, that looked to be heading for legstump, the umpire thought so as well, Bangladesh are falling like nine pins, and Afridi hasn't even brought out his star-man celebration yet, perhaps if he gets a fifth

headshotImage.longCaption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Shafiul Islam c †Sarfaraz Ahmed b Shahid Afridi 0 (8b 0x4 0x6 12m) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: there's the five-for, Afridi doesn't bother celebrating, this one slides on, batsman looks to defend, inside-edges it on to his pad, the ball pops up for the keeper to come round in front of the stumps and collect that, Bangladesh rolled over for 91

dismissalText.commentary: Shahid Afridi not out 24 (23b 4x4 0x6 30m) SR: 104.34

headshotImage.caption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.long: c Shahriar Nafees b Rubel Hossain
dismissalText.commentary: Mohammad Hafeez c Shahriar Nafees b Rubel Hossain 22 (38b 5x4 0x6 48m) SR: 57.89

dismissalComment.html: caught this time. Nasir has been moved out of first slip and Nafees shows him how to hold a catch as Hafeez guides it straight to him while trying to find third man with a late cut
caught this time. Nasir has been moved out of first slip and Nafees shows him how to hold a catch as Hafeez guides it straight to him while trying to find third man with a late cut

make that four, the Mirpur crowd is howling in delight now, Sarfraz departs as he attempts to hook a bouncer, a bit of a top edge and the ball loops in front of square leg, where Shakib collects the chance, Bangladesh are pumped up

is there life in this match yet? Younis Khan is gone now, that was a poor decision from the umpire, the ball slides down the leg side, past the pads, and doesn't touch anything on its way to the keeper, bounces off Mushfiqur's pads and pops up as a catch, a loud appeal, umpire sends an unlucky Younis on his way

and another one, Umar Akmal is gone, Shakib's arm ball goes straight on with the angle to take the top of off, Umar was looking to cut that, expecting that the usual turn that would give him the room to play that stroke, does Afridi need to carry Pakistan with the bat as well?

headshotImage.caption: Imran Farhat player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Imran Farhat player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Imran Farhat player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Imran Farhat player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Imran Farhat b Nasir Hossain 12 (23b 2x4 0x6 39m) SR: 52.17

dismissalComment.html: probably too short to cut that one on off stump. Farhat drags it down into his timbers and Bangladesh have at least something from this opening 10 overs

headshotImage.caption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.long: c Shahriar Nafees b Rubel Hossain
dismissalText.commentary: Mohammad Hafeez c Shahriar Nafees b Rubel Hossain 22 (38b 5x4 0x6 48m) SR: 57.89

dismissalComment.html: caught this time. Nasir has been moved out of first slip and Nafees shows him how to hold a catch as Hafeez guides it straight to him while trying to find third man with a late cut

dismissalText.long: c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Shakib Al Hasan
dismissalText.commentary: Younis Khan c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Shakib Al Hasan 2 (8b 0x4 0x6 11m) SR: 25

dismissalComment.html: is there life in this match yet? Younis Khan is gone now, that was a poor decision from the umpire, the ball slides down the leg side, past the pads, and doesn't touch anything on its way to the keeper, bounces off Mushfiqur's pads and pops up as a catch, a loud appeal, umpire sends an unlucky Younis on his way

dismissalText.long: c Shakib Al Hasan b Rubel Hossain
dismissalText.commentary: Sarfaraz Ahmed c Shakib Al Hasan b Rubel Hossain 2 (3b 0x4 0x6 7m) SR: 66.66

dismissalComment.html: make that four, the Mirpur crowd is howling in delight now, Sarfraz departs as he attempts to hook a bouncer, a bit of a top edge and the ball loops in front of square leg, where Shakib collects the chance, Bangladesh are pumped up

dismissalText.commentary: Umar Akmal b Shakib Al Hasan 7 (13b 1x4 0x6 22m) SR: 53.84

dismissalComment.html: and another one, Umar Akmal is gone, Shakib's arm ball goes straight on with the angle to take the top of off, Umar was looking to cut that, expecting that the usual turn that would give him the room to play that stroke, does Afridi need to carry Pakistan with the bat as well?

batsmen.shot: off side drive on front foot

commentTextItems.html: it's over Afridi gets a thick outside edge past slip to complete the win, it's Pakistan's 20th successive win over Bangladesh. Slightly bizarre fact: The only player to hit a six in this match is Misbah

commentPostTextItems.html: Saadia: "Do we really need to announce the man of the match for this one?" I suppose the adjuticators will next multiple meetings to decide that one.
Hunbbel Meer: "That's one for my Grandsons: 'Sons, I saw that match, when a miracle happened. Afridi was involved in arresting a collapse.'"
Adnan Ozair: "It upsets me that Afridi will finish this match with a strike rate under 100... " Happy now? 24 off 23.

I seem to have riled Travis Rutherford up: "is there such a thing as a 'bizarre fact' in cricket? Aren't the endless bizarre facts what constitute cricket, make it the fascinating game we love to follow, and thus being integral to the game are no longer bizarre. Don't know what that makes it, though. Certainly not an 'ordinary fact'."
Zaidi keeps it simple: "Afridi, Afridi, Afridi..."

Jamil Uddin: "Sid , match is over. But still I am thinking why Nasir has not be given to bowl after having the figure  1-0-1-1." Perhaps Mushfiqur will be asked that at the post-match presentation, which starts now.

Mushfiqur: "It looked like a good track to bat on, we lost a couple of early wickets, credit to the Pakistan bowlers. We need to work on our top-order batting. Last 4-5 years, Shakib and Tamim have been our consistent players, the time has come for someone else to step up. Rubel and shakib bowled well, hopefully in the next match we will bat well also."

Misbah: "It was really looking tough at one stage, the spinners were getting some help, well played by Shahid Afridi. Some balls just straighten, and some turn and bounce. One important thing is, when you have a start you have to carry on, that is a problem with us, many of our batsmen get starts and don't carry on. Afridi is playing wonderful cricket from the day he came back."

Man of the Match is, hold on to your hats, Shahid Afridi: "I want to be consistent in our performance, it is a good practice, the way Misbah is leading the team, the way he is playing, the coach is doing his job as well. The coach decision was good, he told me to go play my own game, I can change my game now (smiles). I tried to experiment with my bowling in this game, and it worked. "
Salman Ahmed sums it up: "Pakistan's Superhero - Lala One!"
Tahir Ti: "I wish I could see Abdul Razzak to Abdul Razzak." Maybe in the next match, which is in a couple of days. See you then. Thanks for all the mails.

commentTextItems.html: there it is, backs away from legstump to make room, slices that fuller delivery towards sweeper cover but can't get it all the way to the rope
and once again, careful defence, how far away is the big hit?
Afridi does a passable impression of Misbah, stretching forward and blocking to the off side
that spins past the face of the bat as Misbah tries to steer an outside off delivery towards point

headshotImage.caption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: pitched up and that is punched towards the bowler
the ball trickles towards the off side
looks to clip this towards square leg but can't get it away
fuller arm ball, inside-edged back towards the bowler
well outside off, Afridi is utterly uninterested in that one, leaves it to the keeper

headshotImage.caption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: make that three in a row, and this match is ending in a hurry now, hammered past point for four more this time
pitched up again, and another boundary, skips away beyond leg and thumps it wide of mid-on for four more, it down to nine needed now
more of the Afridi we know and love, a pitched up delivery is driven inside-out and over cover for a boundary, Shakib closes his eyes in despair
fires this towards the leg stump, can't get it away
stretches forward and defends to the off side
not the prettiest of strokes, a flat-batted hit that loops towards mid-on before rolling towards long-on

headshotImage.caption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: Afridi looks to work this one with the angle towards the leg side, but edges it on to his pads
this one slides straight on, Afridi punches the ball off the back foot towards extra cover
inside-edge this time as Misbah looks to defend, the ball squirts towards backward square leg

dismissalComment.html: Mushfiqur finally falls to the cut, that one from Shoaib bounces extra, it was wide outside off, Mushfiqur throws the bat at it but can only edge it to the keeper, he is extremely disappointed with that stroke, trudges off looking skywards

headshotImage.caption: Saeed Ajmal player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Saeed Ajmal player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: this is all too easy for Pakistan, Razzak closes the face of the bat too early, gets an edge to a delivery that's pitching around off, the edge flies to left of Younis, who clasps that one easily, eight down now and the crowd's mood further worsens

the end of Nasir, just when the partnership seemed to be steadying Bangladesh, a short ball that Nasir wanted to mow over midwicket, it strikes low on the bat and balloons towards short fine leg, the keeper calls early for it and settles under it, there's no Kamran Akmal moment either as Sarfraz calmly collects the skier

headshotImage.caption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.longCaption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.longCaption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.longCaption: Farhad Reza player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Farhad Reza player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Farhad Reza player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Farhad Reza player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Farhad Reza player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Tamim Iqbal lbw b Mohammad Hafeez 0 (4b 0x4 0x6 2m) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: Hafeez has got the big wicket, he's off on a celebratory run after getting Tamim lbw, that was slightly full from Hafeez pitching around middle, Tamim opted to play that off the back foot instead on coming forward, the ball slides on and strikes the pads, probably would have taken leg stump, height wasn't a problem there, Hafeez can't do a thing wrong these days

headshotImage.caption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Umar Gul player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Umar Gul player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Naeem Islam c Misbah-ul-Haq b Umar Gul 5 (13b 1x4 0x6 19m) SR: 38.46

dismissalComment.html: another one goes! After that drive, Naeem couldn't tempt poking at a full delivery outside off, just moved away a hint and took the outside edge, Misbah stood firm at slip, watching it closely and took a good, low catch

headshotImage.caption: Shoaib Malik player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shoaib Malik player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Mushfiqur Rahim c †Sarfaraz Ahmed b Shoaib Malik 11 (27b 0x4 0x6 25m) SR: 40.74

dismissalComment.html: Mushfiqur finally falls to the cut, that one from Shoaib bounces extra, it was wide outside off, Mushfiqur throws the bat at it but can only edge it to the keeper, he is extremely disappointed with that stroke, trudges off looking skywards

headshotImage.caption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Shoaib Malik player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shoaib Malik player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.long: c Shoaib Malik b Shahid Afridi
dismissalText.commentary: Shahriar Nafees c Shoaib Malik b Shahid Afridi 7 (29b 1x4 0x6 51m) SR: 24.13

dismissalComment.html: Afridi joins the party, again there's a lot of bounce for the bowler, again the batsman goes for the cut, again there's a top-edge, slices it to Shoaib Malik at backward point, and that's the fourth wicket, Nafees has had a horrid time today, looked completely out of place

dismissalText.commentary: Mahmudullah c †Sarfaraz Ahmed b Shahid Afridi 1 (2b 0x4 0x6 2m) SR: 50

dismissalComment.html: this match is heading for a very early finish, plenty of spin for Afridi, length ball turning away, Mahmudullah stretches forward to defend, the outside edge results, easy for Sarfraz, five down now

dismissalText.commentary: Nasir Hossain c †Sarfaraz Ahmed b Aizaz Cheema 21 (40b 2x4 0x6 42m) SR: 52.5

dismissalComment.html: the end of Nasir, just when the partnership seemed to be steadying Bangladesh, a short ball that Nasir wanted to mow over midwicket, it strikes low on the bat and balloons towards short fine leg, the keeper calls early for it and settles under it, there's no Kamran Akmal moment either as Sarfraz calmly collects the skier

dismissalText.long: c Umar Akmal b Shahid Afridi
dismissalText.commentary: Shakib Al Hasan c Umar Akmal b Shahid Afridi 15 (38b 0x4 0x6 61m) SR: 39.47

dismissalComment.html: how many batsmen will get out playing the cut? it was well outside off, Shakib stretches to reach that and slaps it limply to point, not the finest of strokes that, and once again that man Afridi makes an instant impact

headshotImage.caption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Saeed Ajmal player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Saeed Ajmal player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.long: c Younis Khan b Saeed Ajmal
dismissalText.commentary: Abdur Razzak c Younis Khan b Saeed Ajmal 3 (6b 0x4 0x6 4m) SR: 50

dismissalComment.html: this is all too easy for Pakistan, Razzak closes the face of the bat too early, gets an edge to a delivery that's pitching around off, the edge flies to left of Younis, who clasps that one easily, eight down now and the crowd's mood further worsens

headshotImage.caption: Farhad Reza player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Farhad Reza player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Farhad Reza player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Farhad Reza player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Farhad Reza lbw b Shahid Afridi 1 (6b 0x4 0x6 21m) SR: 16.66

dismissalComment.html: and another one for Afridi, Reza is lbw, he was stretching forward to defend that one down the track, it spins past the inside edge and strikes the pads, that looked to be heading for legstump, the umpire thought so as well, Bangladesh are falling like nine pins, and Afridi hasn't even brought out his star-man celebration yet, perhaps if he gets a fifth

headshotImage.caption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Shafiul Islam c †Sarfaraz Ahmed b Shahid Afridi 0 (8b 0x4 0x6 12m) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: there's the five-for, Afridi doesn't bother celebrating, this one slides on, batsman looks to defend, inside-edges it on to his pad, the ball pops up for the keeper to come round in front of the stumps and collect that, Bangladesh rolled over for 91

headshotImage.caption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.long: c Shahriar Nafees b Rubel Hossain
dismissalText.commentary: Mohammad Hafeez c Shahriar Nafees b Rubel Hossain 22 (38b 5x4 0x6 48m) SR: 57.89

dismissalComment.html: caught this time. Nasir has been moved out of first slip and Nafees shows him how to hold a catch as Hafeez guides it straight to him while trying to find third man with a late cut

headshotImage.caption: Imran Farhat player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Imran Farhat player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Imran Farhat player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Imran Farhat player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Imran Farhat b Nasir Hossain 12 (23b 2x4 0x6 39m) SR: 52.17

dismissalComment.html: probably too short to cut that one on off stump. Farhat drags it down into his timbers and Bangladesh have at least something from this opening 10 overs

dismissalText.long: c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Shakib Al Hasan
dismissalText.commentary: Younis Khan c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Shakib Al Hasan 2 (8b 0x4 0x6 11m) SR: 25

dismissalComment.html: is there life in this match yet? Younis Khan is gone now, that was a poor decision from the umpire, the ball slides down the leg side, past the pads, and doesn't touch anything on its way to the keeper, bounces off Mushfiqur's pads and pops up as a catch, a loud appeal, umpire sends an unlucky Younis on his way

dismissalText.long: c Shakib Al Hasan b Rubel Hossain
dismissalText.commentary: Sarfaraz Ahmed c Shakib Al Hasan b Rubel Hossain 2 (3b 0x4 0x6 7m) SR: 66.66

dismissalComment.html: make that four, the Mirpur crowd is howling in delight now, Sarfraz departs as he attempts to hook a bouncer, a bit of a top edge and the ball loops in front of square leg, where Shakib collects the chance, Bangladesh are pumped up

dismissalText.commentary: Misbah-ul-Haq not out 16 (46b 1x4 1x6 58m) SR: 34.78
Umar Akmal b Shakib Al Hasan 7 (13b 1x4 0x6 22m) SR: 53.84

dismissalComment.html: and another one, Umar Akmal is gone, Shakib's arm ball goes straight on with the angle to take the top of off, Umar was looking to cut that, expecting that the usual turn that would give him the room to play that stroke, does Afridi need to carry Pakistan with the bat as well?

dismissalText.commentary: Shahid Afridi not out 24 (23b 4x4 0x6 30m) SR: 104.34

and another one, Umar Akmal is gone, Shakib's arm ball goes straight on with the angle to take the top of off, Umar was looking to cut that, expecting that the usual turn that would give him the room to play that stroke, does Afridi need to carry Pakistan with the bat as well?

notes: Drinks: Bangladesh - 48/5 in 18.0 overs (Shakib Al Hasan 7, Nasir Hossain 9)
Bangladesh: 50 runs in 19.1 overs (115 balls), Extras 8
Innings Break: Bangladesh - 91/10 in 30.3 overs (Rubel Hossain 15)
Pakistan: 50 runs in 15.6 overs (96 balls), Extras 6
Dinner: Pakistan - 58/4 in 17.0 overs (Misbah-ul-Haq 7, Umar Akmal 7)

milestones.description: This is the lowest match aggregate (184) involving teams Pakistan & Bangladesh in ODIs

stories.title: Pakistan in Bangladesh, 2011-12
stories.subTitle: First ODI
stories.summary: Wisden's review of the first ODI between Bangladesh and Pakistan, Mirpur, 2011-12

stories.title: Pitch not offering us home advantage, says Mushfiqur
stories.subTitle: Bangladesh v Pakistan, 1st ODI, Mirpur
stories.seoTitle: Bangladesh v Pakistan, 1st ODI: Pitch not offering Bangladesh home advantage, says Mushfiqur Rahim
stories.summary: Mushfiqur Rahim, the Bangladesh captain, has said the Mirpur pitch on which his team lost by five wickets to Pakistan was not what he expected and therefore did not offer home advantage
stories.byline: Mohammad Isam at the Shere Bangla National Stadium

stories.title: Afridi's five leads rout of Bangladesh
stories.subTitle: Bangladesh v Pakistan, 1st ODI, Mirpur
stories.seoTitle: Bangladesh v Pakistan, 1st ODI, Mirpur: Shahid Afridi's five leads rout of Bangladesh
stories.summary: Pakistan's spinners exploited the bounce and turn in the pitch to wreck Bangladesh. Their batsmen then made a mess of chasing a small target before victory was finally achieved
